meanings.definition: A thing whose name is either forgotten or not known.
meanings.sent1: I found some strange thingumajigs in the attic.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps a box of thingumajigs for crafting.
meanings.sent3: The mystery box was full of thingumajigs that made everyone curious.
meanings.sent4: His workshop was a treasure trove of thingumajigs waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling all sorts of thingumajigs.

meanings.definition: An object whose name is not remembered or not known.
meanings.sent1: Grandma has a drawer full of thingumajigs from her travels.
meanings.sent2: The children played with various thingumajigs they found in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The box of thingumajigs seemed to multiply every time someone opened it.
meanings.sent4: The room was cluttered with thingumajigs, making it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed ancient thingumajigs from civilizations long gone.

meanings.definition: A gadget or device whose name is unknown or forgotten.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen drawer was filled with useful thingumajigs.
meanings.sent2: He always carries a pocket full of handy thingumajigs.
meanings.sent3: The quirky inventor created a machine full of colorful thingumajigs.
meanings.sent4: The spaceship was equipped with futuristic thingumajigs for space exploration.
meanings.sent5: The toolbox was a jumble of metal thingumajigs waiting to be used.
